Name: PixCursor
About the game: PixCursor is a pixel art tool that lets you draw pictures by keyboard. Features Edit pictures as same as edit texts. Simple, accurate and quick. Good support for area operation: scale, flip, draw circle/rect/line/curve, etc. Good support for mutiple frames/layers. Automatically picks up the color palette.
